attributes.action: Scrap the proposed increase for travelling fares in London!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is very unfair in today's current economic situation to inflate the public transport fares knowing the fact that its already been so expensive for a normal person like me who lives her life on the edge,so please do look into this matter and take a stand for those who contribute alot but get less and its just not for the personal advantage of mine but its for all those who seek change but cant express it the way they want it,let the prices remain the same for everyone among us atleast for the next year!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the GLA.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
